title: While My Eyes Were Closed
description: A nail-biting psychological drama for fans of Paula Daly, Daughter, and  The Girl with No Past.One, two, three... Lisa Dale shuts her eyes and counts to one hundred during a game of hide-and-seek. When she opens them, her four-year-old daughter Ella is gone. Disappeared without a trace.The police, the media, and Lisa's family all think they know who snatched Ella. But what if the person who took her isn't a stranger? What if they are convinced they are doing the right thing?And what if Lisa's little girl is in danger of disappearing forever?
author: Linda Green
